FAQ

OMG what do I wear?

The Wedding ceremony and reception on Saturday will be a little more formal. Ladies: Wear your formal evening wear! If you've got a full-length gown hanging in the back of your closet, this would be a great opportunity to break it out. No color restrictions here (except maybe not white - don't want to be confused for the bride!). Gentlemen: Jacket and ties are encouraged. For those with a tuxedo, this would be a good time to dust that off too, but it's by no means required to get past the bouncers (There won't be any bouncers.)

I have a pretty seriously allergy to [insert allergen here], can you accomodate me?

Yes! Get in touch with us ASAP, so we can make sure we keep any [insert allergen here] away from you!

Should I rent a car?

Our recommendation is yes. If you choose to stay at the Country Lodge transportation will be provided to the wedding site. However if you are staying anywhere else or want some wheels to see what Colorado has to offer than we suggest a rental car as other options are limited. Uber and Lyft will be limited in and around the Wedding venue.

You decided to have your wedding XXX(X?) miles away and I cant find a babysitter for 3 days. Can I bring kids to the wedding?

Yes! We will be supplying complimentary babysitting for the ceremony and reception at the venue location. The little ones can hangout with you or the other kiddos and caretaker for as much or as little as you like. Now you donâ€™t have that excuse not to come.
